Assume that 1) the game would end after this turn and 2) the black player does not have any more meeples to place on the landscape. Return the answer in the following format: [Tile = <selected tile>, total_points_turn = <the points by the end of this turn for black player>, total_points_final = <maximum points black player can achieve at the end of this game>]
